effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Stormstrike, Lava Lash and Doom Winds by 5%, up to 25%. Maelstrom Weapon spenders have a 1.0% chance to remove Winning Streak! per Maelstrom Weapon spent.

Set: When you lose your Winning Streak! the winds shift into Doom Winds for 3 sec. When Doom Winds deal damage, your next Crash Lightning deals 12.0% increased damage, up to 60.0%. This effect can be stored up to 10 stacks. Additionally, Crash Lightning deals 75% more damage to your main target.

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 115,942 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

spells.description:
Equip: When damaged below 30% health, gain a shield for 8 sec which absorbs up to 1.8 million damage.

This effect can only be triggered once every 4 min but is reduced by 12 sec per unique Algari gem color socketed.

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 76 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to Hype you up, granting 367 Haste up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum Hype, amp it up by 100% for 15 sec before starting again.

Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 7,441 to 9,095 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 276 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Gain a high chance to follow up your attacks with a fiery gilded uppercut, dealing 372,319 Fire damage to your target. Molten gold continues to splatter to deal 103,422 Fire damage over 5 sec to all nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 enemies.
